definition: (British informal) faulty, a man's detachable insert (usually starched) to simulate the front of a shirt
details:
adjective
- (British informal) faulty
= synonyms: dicky
noun
- a man's detachable insert (usually starched) to simulate the front of a shirt
= synonyms: dicky
- a small third seat in the back of an old-fashioned two-seater
= synonyms: dicky
